Holdings Limited (“Ley Choon” or the “Group”) is one of the largest Underground Utilities Infrastructure companies in Singapore focusing on the following two key business segments: (a) Pipeline Works, which consists of Underground Utilities Infrastructure construction and maintenance, sewer pipeline rehabilitation, laying of high voltage transmission power cable and high pressure transmission LNG GAS pipeline; and (b) Asphalt Premix, Milling & Paving Works, which consists of asphalt pre-mix production, sales and construction waste recycling as well as road and airfield construction and maintenance.
